amendment.description: Amendment deletes the $43.2 million fossil and energy conservation authorization for operating and maintaining oil technology programs at the National Institute for Petroleum and Energy Research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of October 10 as amendment No. 9, to eliminate the funding for the Department of Energy's fossil and energy conservation program relating to oil technology at the National Institute for Petroleum and Energy Research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kleczka amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
